question: You have resolved an issue for an existing Member. What should you say to transition into the Member Review?
briefing: In this Module, you will learn what to say for transitioning to the Member Review after Problem Resolution, the New Member Entry Line, and the Existing Member Entry Line

keyElements.script: Mr. Jackson ( Member Name ), what else can I assist you with today?
Thank you for being a Cohen Brown Credit Union Member, I appreciate the opportunity to serve you .
One of my responsibilities is to help Members achieve their financial goals and make their banking more convenient .

Circumstances for our Members typically change over time , and we are implementing a way to better understand our Members' current and future financial needs , and look for all the ways to be helpful to them.
It is a complimentary service we provide and, of course, everything will remain confidential.
This usually takes only about 10–15 minutes .
Let's get this started for you right now .
